data.text: @ItsMrCoffeetoY1 Yea me too. seems pretty unavoidable- if ur nuts start hurting maybe it’s time increase social distance 🤷‍♂️ i dunno https://t.co/o55V7Z7EDf

@Joefusko I work with lot of liberals. Good folks but liberal. They've all gotten jabbed. We have a lunch coming up. I have zero issues defending my no-jab policy so I'd never back out of going over that. But NOW, I'm not as comfy being around jabbers...🧐

@ItsMrCoffeetoY1 Somem funky is def goin on... Some weird type of shedding or something is affecting those in proximity to the Guinea pigs even if they didn’t get the jab themselves... it is alarming https://t.co/UYSxtUL0rK

@Joefusko My fear is that those vaxxed are spreading it. 

I'm no scientist but if they basically *are* Covid due to their mRNA then aren't they just a giant covid spreader?
